detail_desc: Ankle-length trousers in a sturdy weave with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly and two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners. Detachable tie belt, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short lace dress with buttons at the back and an elasticated seam at the waist with a wide frill trim. Short, scallop-edged sleeves and a scalloped hem. Jersey inner dress.
Short, sleeveless jersey dress with a V-neck at the back and seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
